Update.Body: {"variables":{"version":"2020"},"query":"query GetUnityReleases($version: String) {getUnityReleases(limit: 1 stream: [TECH, LTS] platform: WINDOWS architecture: X86_64 version: $version) {edges {node {version releaseDate releaseNotes{url} downloads {... on UnityReleaseHubDownload {url}}}}}}","operationName":"GetUnityReleases"}

AdditionalInfo.RegexInReleaseNotes: To remove Markdown escape regexes (ANSI/VT100), additional regexes has been added in ReleaseNotes field
AdditionalInfo.ParseReleaseNotes: { Param ($String) return ((Show-Markdown -InputObject $String) -creplace '�\[(?:.*?)m(.+?)�\[0m', '$1').Split("Release Notes")[1].Split("Packages updated")[0].Split("Package changes")[0].Split("System Requirements")[0].Trim() -creplace '(?m)^(\w.+)\n\n-', "`$1`n-" }
